name: RAPL_XS_FUNC_CHK_PSYS_DOMAIN_MSR
summary: Check whether Platform system Domain RAPL MSR 0x64D is enabled or not, which is the prerequisite of loading intel_rapl driver,  if the value is non-zero means PSYS Domain RAPL is enabled, otherwise it's not enabled, perform this case in pre-silicon and Power On platform to check RAPL level enabling status in simics and HW/FW.
